text:
Kannanalloor is a village situated in Mukhathala block panchayat in Kollam district, Kerala state, India.
Politics.
Kannanalloor is a part of Kundara assembly constituency in Kollam (Lok Sabha constituency). Shri. J. Mercykutty Amma is the current MLA of Kundara. Shri.N. K. Premachandran is the current member of parliament of Kollam. CPM, INC, RSP, etc are the major political parties.
Geography.
Kannanalloor is a small village in Thazhuthala panchayat. It is 13 km from Kollam, 2 km from Mukhathala and 62 km from Thiruvananthapuram. Kannanalloor is a border of Thiruvananthapuram-Kollam districts. It connects places Mylakad, Nedumpana, Kottiyam, Palathara, Adichanalloor, etc.
Demographics.
Malayalam is the native language of Kannanalloor.
